title: Championship Jewels
body: I have 14 championship jewels. How do I buy a team logo for my mastery flash or whatever?

replies.body: How dumb is a sale where you can only buy stuff on certain days...Lotta people are going to be left with extra junk (jewel shards) in their inventory. I sure hope there is a back up to get rid of the shards once worlds is done. As in there are no more days I can buy and I only need 2 more...Marketing team needs to be fired.

As *Lew* mentioned, purchasing any of the 2016 Worlds team icons with the gray background on the store. You can then upgrade them in the Hextech Crafting menu.

Let me know if you have any questions.

You buy one of the 2016 Worlds team icons for 250 RP and then you [upgrade ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-)it with the jewels.
